Dev Environment Setup
=======================

Overview
^^^^^^^^^^^

1. Clone this repo:

   .. code-block:: bash

      git clone https://github.com/MbodiAI/mbodied-agents.git

2. Install system dependencies:

   .. code-block:: bash

      source install.bash
      hatch run pip install '.[extras]'

3. Then for each new terminal, run:

   .. code-block:: bash

      hatch shell
